modifyFundPassword.title: Modifying Fund Password
modifyFundPassword.des: As a security precaution, resetting your password will put your account on a 24 hours withdrawal hold and it can’t be disabled manually.
modifyFundPassword.warning1: The Password field is required and can't be empty.
modifyFundPassword.warning4: The confirm password is required and can't be empty.
modifyFundPassword.warning5: The fund password cannot be the same as the login password
modifyFundPassword.warning6: The current and new funds password can't be same
modifyFundPassword.warning7: Passwords must be at least 8-20 characters with 1 capital letter and 1 number
